thread.title: Mike Bunn
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Mike Bunn

author: Mike Bunn
title: Mike Bunn
text: I had great sales guy and great delivery guys except when they delivered the sofa and installed it. I notices a nice long scratch on my wall. It wasn't there before they came and now I am going to have to get it fixed before I move out to the town house. I wish they would have told me on the way out the door.
